<js>
fa=java.ajax("https://m.qidian.com/category/male");
fb=java.ajax("https://m.qidian.com/category/female");
reg=/(\/category\/detail\?[^"]+).+?>[\u4e00-\u9fa5]+/gi;
tmp=""; result="";
x=["","all?style=2&page=searchPage&chanId=","mm/all?style=2&page=searchPage&chanId="];
function f(a,b){
tmp+=String(a.match(reg)).replace(/,?(\/category[^"]+).+?>([\u4e00-\u9fa5]+)/g,"$2 / "+b+"::$1&&").replace(/::\D+(\d+)\D+(\d+)\D+(female|male)&&/g,"::/$3$1&subCateId=$2&&").replace(/female/g,x[2]).replace(/male/g,x[1]);return tmp;};
result+=f(fa,"男频");
result+=f(fb,"女频");
result="三江::/book/sanjiang&&强推::/book/strongrec&&签约作品::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&sign=1&&免费小说::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&vip=0&&总收藏榜::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=11&&总字数榜::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=3&&周推荐榜::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=9&&月推荐榜::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=10&&总推荐榜::/all?style=2&page=searchPage&orderId=2&&"+result;
</js>

tmp=JSON.parse(tmp);
cate=java.ajax("http://api.zhuishushenqi.com/cats/lv2");
cate=JSON.parse(cate);
result="";
function f(a,b) {
	var x="";y=tmp[a];
	for (i in y) 
{x+=b+y[i].shortTitle+"::/ranking/"+y[i]._id+"&&";}
	result +=x;
	};
function ff(a,b) {
	var x="";y=cate[a];u1="::/book/by-categories?gender=";u2="&type=hot&start={{(searchPage-1)*50}}&limit=50&&"
	for (i in y) {
x+=b+y[i].major+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+u2;
		for (j in y[i].mins) {x+=b+y[i].major+"/"+y[i].mins[j]+u1+a+"&major="+y[i].major+"&minor="+y[i].mins[j]+u2;}
	};result +=x;
	};
f("male","[男]");f("female","[女]");f("epub","[出版]");
ff("male","[男]");ff("female","[女]");ff("press","[出版]");
String(result);
</js>

ruleBookContent: class.readerCon@tag.p@textNodes#.*\W完本神站\W.*|(?m)^([^\d\w]+|[Pp][Ss][：:].+)$|—{3,}|一秒记住、永不丢失！
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
var a=["所有","玄幻","奇幻","武侠","仙侠","都市","军事","历史","游戏","竞技","科幻","悬疑","灵异","其他","古言","仙侠奇缘","言情","青春","玄幻言情","悬疑灵异","科幻空间","游戏竞技","BL文","GL人文","二次元"];
var b=["[未]","[更]","[完]"];
var c=[" 30"," 50","100","200","200+"];
var d=["[新]","📖","👍","⭐"];
var e=["lastupdate","allvisit","allvote","goodnum"];
var x="";
for (var i=1;i<a.length;i++)
{
for (var j=1;j<b.length;j++)
{
for (var k=1;k<c.length+1;k++)
{
for (var l=1;l<d.length;l++)
{
x= x+d[l]+" "+a[i]+" "+c[k-1]+"万 "+b[j]+"::/all/"+i+"_"+e[l]+"_"+k+"_"+j+"_"+l+".html&&";
}
}
}
}
result=x;
String(result);
</js>
